  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

html {
  font-size: 16px;
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
}

body {
  font-family: 'Cairo', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif;
  background: var(--primary-bg);
  color: var(--text-primary);
  line-height: 1.6;
  overflow-x: hidden;
  direction: rtl;
}

/* =======================================================
   RTL & Arabic Support
======================================================= */

[dir="rtl"] {
  text-align: right;
}

.arabic-text {
  font-family: 'Cairo', 'Amiri', serif;
  font-feature-settings: 'liga' on, 'calt' on;
}

/* =======================================================
   Typography
======================================================= */

h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
  font-weight: 600;
  line-height: 1.2;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

h1 { font-size: 2.25rem; }
h2 { font-size: 1.875rem; }
h3 { font-size: 1.5rem; }
h4 { font-size: 1.25rem; }
h5 { font-size: 1.125rem; }
h6 { font-size: 1rem; }

p {
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  color: var(--text-secondary);
}

a {
  color: var(--accent-blue);
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: color var(--transition-normal);
}

a:hover {
  color: var(--accent-cyan);
}

/* =======================================================
   Layout Components
======================================================= */

.container {
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0 1rem;
}

.container-fluid {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 0 1rem;
}

.row {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  margin: -0.5rem;
}

.col {
  flex: 1;
  padding: 0.5rem;
}

.col-2 { flex: 0 0 16.666667%; }
.col-3 { flex: 0 0 25%; }
.col-4 { flex: 0 0 33.333333%; }
.col-6 { flex: 0 0 50%; }
.col-8 { flex: 0 0 66.666667%; }
.col-9 { flex: 0 0 75%; }
.col-12 { flex: 0 0 100%; }

/* =======================================================
   Cards & Panels
======================================================= */

.card {
  background: var(--card-bg);
  border-radius: 12px;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
  overflow: hidden;
  transition: all var(--transition-normal);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-light);
}

.card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
}

.card-header {
  padding: 1.5rem;
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-light);
  background: rgba(37, 99, 235, 0.05);
}

.card-body {
  padding: 1.5rem;
}

.card-footer {
  padding: 1rem 1.5rem;
  border-top: 1px solid var(--border-light);
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

/* Security Status Cards */
.security-card {
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.security-card::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  width: 4px;
  height: 100%;
  background: var(--gradient-primary);
}

.security-card.critical::before {
  background: var(--gradient-danger);
}

.security-card.warning::before {
  background: var(--gradient-warning);
}

.security-card.success::before {
  background: var(--gradient-success);
}

/* =======================================================
   Buttons & Interactive Elements
======================================================= */

.btn {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
  font-size: 0.875rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  border-radius: 8px;
  border: none;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all var(--transition-normal);
  text-decoration: none;
  font-family: inherit;
}

.btn-primary {
  background: var(--gradient-primary);
  color: white;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-1px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
}

.btn-success {
  background: var(--gradient-success);
  color: white;
}

.btn-warning {
  background: var(--gradient-warning);
  color: white;
}

.btn-danger {
  background: var(--gradient-danger);
  color: white;
}

.btn-outline {
  background: transparent;
  border: 2px solid var(--border-medium);
  color: var(--text-primary);
}

.btn-outline:hover {
  background: var(--accent-blue);
  border-color: var(--accent-blue);
}

.btn-sm {
  padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
}

.btn-lg {
  padding: 1rem 2rem;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

/* Icon Buttons */
.btn-icon {
  padding: 0.75rem;
  border-radius: 50%;
}

.btn-icon i {
  font-size: 1.25rem;
}

/* =======================================================
   Forms & Inputs
======================================================= */

.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.form-label {
  display: block;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: var(--text-primary);
}

.form-control {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 0.75rem 1rem;
  font-size: 0.875rem;
  background: var(--secondary-bg);
  border: 2px solid var(--border-light);
  border-radius: 8px;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  transition: all var(--transition-normal);
  font-family: inherit;
}

.form-control:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: var(--accent-blue);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(37, 99, 235, 0.1);
}

.form-control::placeholder {
  color: var(--text-muted);
}

/* Search Input */
.search-wrapper {
  position: relative;
}

.search-input {
  padding-right: 3rem;
}

.search-icon {
  position: absolute;
  left: 1rem;
  top: 50%;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  color: var(--text-muted);
}

/* Toggle Switch */
.toggle-switch {
  position: relative;
  display: inline-block;
  width: 60px;
  height: 34px;
}

.toggle-switch input {
  opacity: 0;
  width: 0;
  height: 0;
}

.slider {
  position: absolute;
  cursor: pointer;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background-color: var(--border-medium);
  transition: var(--transition-normal);
  border-radius: 34px;
}

.slider:before {
  position: absolute;
  content: "";
  height: 26px;
  width: 26px;
  right: 4px;
  bottom: 4px;
  background-color: white;
  transition: var(--transition-normal);
  border-radius: 50%;
}

input:checked + .slider {
  background: var(--gradient-primary);
}

input:checked + .slider:before {
  transform: translateX(-26px);
}

/* =======================================================
   Status Indicators & Badges
======================================================= */

.badge {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  border-radius: 9999px;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  letter-spacing: 0.05em;
}

.badge-success {
  background: rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.1);
  color: var(--success-green);
  border: 1px solid rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.2);
}

.badge-warning {
  background: rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.1);
  color: var(--warning-yellow);
  border: 1px solid rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.2);
}

.badge-danger {
  background: rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.1);
  color: var(--danger-red);
  border: 1px solid rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.2);
}

.badge-info {
  background: rgba(6, 182, 212, 0.1);
  color: var(--accent-cyan);
  border: 1px solid rgba(6, 182, 212, 0.2);
}

/* Status Dots */
.status-dot {
  display: inline-block;
  width: 8px;
  height: 8px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  margin-left: 0.5rem;
}

.status-dot.online {
  background: var(--success-green);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.3);
}

.status-dot.offline {
  background: var(--danger-red);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.3);
}

.status-dot.warning {
  background: var(--warning-yellow);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.3);
}

/* =======================================================
   Progress Bars & Loaders
======================================================= */

.progress {
  width: 100%;
  height: 8px;
  background: var(--border-dark);
  border-radius: 4px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.progress-bar {
  height: 100%;
  background: var(--gradient-primary);
  border-radius: 4px;
  transition: width var(--transition-slow);
  position: relative;
}

.progress-bar.success {
  background: var(--gradient-success);
}

.progress-bar.warning {
  background: var(--gradient-warning);
}

.progress-bar.danger {
  background: var(--gradient-danger);
}

/* Animated Progress */
.progress-bar.animated::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  right: 0;
  background-image: linear-gradient(
    45deg,
    rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15) 25%,
    transparent 25%,
    transparent 50%,
    rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15) 50%,
    rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15) 75%,
    transparent 75%,
    transparent
  );
  background-size: 1rem 1rem;
  animation: progress-bar-stripes 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes progress-bar-stripes {
  from { background-position: 1rem 0; }
  to { background-position: 0 0; }
}

/* Circular Progress */
.circular-progress {
  position: relative;
  width: 80px;
  height: 80px;
}

.circular-progress svg {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  transform: rotate(-90deg);
}

.circular-progress circle {
  fill: none;
  stroke-width: 8;
  stroke-linecap: round;
}

.circular-progress .bg-circle {
  stroke: var(--border-dark);
}

.circular-progress .progress-circle {
  stroke: var(--accent-blue);
  stroke-dasharray: 251.2;
  stroke-dashoffset: 251.2;
  transition: stroke-dashoffset var(--transition-slow);
}

/* =======================================================
   Tables
======================================================= */

.table-container {
  background: var(--card-bg);
  border-radius: 12px;
  overflow: hidden;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-light);
}

.table {
  width: 100%;
  border-collapse: collapse;
}

.table th,
.table td {
  padding: 1rem;
  text-align: right;
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-light);
}

.table th {
  background: rgba(37, 99, 235, 0.05);
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  position: sticky;
  top: 0;
  z-index: 10;
}

.table tr:hover {
  background: rgba(37, 99, 235, 0.05);
}

.table tr:last-child td {
  border-bottom: none;
}

/* =======================================================
   Alerts & Notifications
======================================================= */

.alert {
  padding: 1rem 1.5rem;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  border-right: 4px solid;
  position: relative;
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-start;
}

.alert-success {
  background: rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--success-green);
  color: var(--success-green);
}

.alert-warning {
  background: rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--warning-yellow);
  color: var(--warning-yellow);
}

.alert-danger {
  background: rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--danger-red);
  color: var(--danger-red);
}

.alert-info {
  background: rgba(6, 182, 212, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--accent-cyan);
  color: var(--accent-cyan);
}

.alert-icon {
  margin-left: 0.75rem;
  font-size: 1.25rem;
}

.alert-content {
  flex: 1;
}

.alert-title {
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
}

.alert-message {
  opacity: 0.8;
}

/* =======================================================
   Tooltips
======================================================= */

.tooltip {
  position: relative;
  display: inline-block;
}

.tooltip .tooltip-text {
  visibility: hidden;
  width: 200px;
  background: var(--secondary-bg);
  color: var(--text-primary);
  text-align: center;
  border-radius: 6px;
  padding: 0.5rem;
  position: absolute;
  z-index: 1000;
  bottom: 125%;
  right: 50%;
  margin-right: -100px;
  opacity: 0;
  transition: opacity var(--transition-normal);
  font-size: 0.875rem;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-light);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
}

.tooltip .tooltip-text::after {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  top: 100%;
  right: 50%;
  margin-right: -5px;
  border-width: 5px;
  border-style: solid;
  border-color: var(--secondary-bg) transparent transparent transparent;
}

.tooltip:hover .tooltip-text {
  visibility: visible;
  opacity: 1;
}

/* =======================================================
   Animations & Transitions
======================================================= */

.fade-in {
  animation: fadeIn var(--transition-slow) ease-in;
}

.slide-up {
  animation: slideUp var(--transition-normal) ease-out;
}

.scale-in {
  animation: scaleIn var(--transition-normal) ease-out;
}

@keyframes fadeIn {
  from { opacity: 0; }
  to { opacity: 1; }
}

@keyframes slideUp {
  from {
    transform: translateY(20px);
    opacity: 0;
  }
  to {
    transform: translateY(0);
    opacity: 1;
  }
}

@keyframes scaleIn {
  from {
    transform: scale(0.95);
    opacity: 0;
  }
  to {
    transform: scale(1);
    opacity: 1;
  }
}

/* Pulse Animation for Status Indicators */
.pulse {
  animation: pulse 2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.6, 1) infinite;
}

@keyframes pulse {
  0%, 100% {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  50% {
    opacity: 0.5;
  }
}

/* Glow Effect */
.glow {
  box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(37, 99, 235, 0.3);
  animation: glow 2s ease-in-out infinite alternate;
}

@keyframes glow {
  from {
    box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(37, 99, 235, 0.3);
  }
  to {
    box-shadow: 0 0 30px rgba(37, 99, 235, 0.6);
  }
}

/* =======================================================
   Utility Classes
======================================================= */

.text-center { text-align: center; }
.text-left { text-align: left; }
.text-right { text-align: right; }

.d-none { display: none; }
.d-block { display: block; }
.d-flex { display: flex; }
.d-grid { display: grid; }

.justify-center { justify-content: center; }
.justify-between { justify-content: space-between; }
.justify-end { justify-content: flex-end; }

.items-center { align-items: center; }
.items-start { align-items: flex-start; }
.items-end { align-items: flex-end; }

.flex-col { flex-direction: column; }
.flex-wrap { flex-wrap: wrap; }

.w-full { width: 100%; }
.h-full { height: 100%; }

.m-0 { margin: 0; }
.m-1 { margin: 0.25rem; }
.m-2 { margin: 0.5rem; }
.m-3 { margin: 0.75rem; }
.m-4 { margin: 1rem; }

.p-0 { padding: 0; }
.p-1 { padding: 0.25rem; }
.p-2 { padding: 0.5rem; }
.p-3 { padding: 0.75rem; }
.p-4 { padding: 1rem; }

.mt-0 { margin-top: 0; }
.mt-1 { margin-top: 0.25rem; }
.mt-2 { margin-top: 0.5rem; }
.mt-3 { margin-top: 0.75rem; }
.mt-4 { margin-top: 1rem; }

.mb-0 { margin-bottom: 0; }
.mb-1 { margin-bottom: 0.25rem; }
.mb-2 { margin-bottom: 0.5rem; }
.mb-3 { margin-bottom: 0.75rem; }
.mb-4 { margin-bottom: 1rem; }

.rounded { border-radius: 8px; }
.rounded-lg { border-radius: 12px; }
.rounded-full { border-radius: 9999px; }

.shadow { box-shadow: var(--shadow-md); }
.shadow-lg { box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg); }
.shadow-xl { box-shadow: var(--shadow-xl); }

/* =======================================================
   Responsive Design
======================================================= */

@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .container {
    max-width: 100%;
    padding: 0 1rem;
  }
  
  .col-lg-6 {
    flex: 0 0 50%;
  }
  
  .col-lg-12 {
    flex: 0 0 100%;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  html {
    font-size: 14px;
  }
  
  .row {
    margin: -0.25rem;
  }
  
  .col {
    padding: 0.25rem;
  }
  
  .col-md-12 {
    flex: 0 0 100%;
  }
  
  .card-body {
    padding: 1rem;
  }
  
  .btn {
    padding: 0.625rem 1.25rem;
    font-size: 0.8rem;
  }
  
  h1 { font-size: 1.875rem; }
  h2 { font-size: 1.5rem; }
  h3 { font-size: 1.25rem; }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .col-sm-12 {
    flex: 0 0 100%;
  }
  
  .btn {
    width: 100%;
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  }
  
  .card-header,
  .card-body {
    padding: 0.75rem;
  }
}

/* =======================================================
   Print Styles
======================================================= */

@media print {
  body {
    background: white;
    color: black;
  }
  
  .card {
    border: 1px solid #ccc;
    box-shadow: none;
  }
  
  .btn {
    display: none;
  }
  
  .sidebar {
    display: none;
  }
}

/* =======================================================
   Accessibility Improvements
======================================================= */

@media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
  *,
  *::before,
  *::after {
    animation-duration: 0.01ms !important;
    animation-iteration-count: 1 !important;
    transition-duration: 0.01ms !important;
  }
}

.sr-only {
  position: absolute;
  width: 1px;
  height: 1px;
  padding: 0;
  margin: -1px;
  overflow: hidden;
  clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
  white-space: nowrap;
  border: 0;
}

/* Focus Styles */
.btn:focus,
.form-control:focus,
a:focus {
  outline: 2px solid var(--accent-blue);
  outline-offset: 2px;
}

/* High Contrast Mode Support */
@media (prefers-contrast: high) {
  :root {
    --border-light: #ffffff;
    --border-medium: #ffffff;
    --text-secondary: #ffffff;
  }
}

   Security Dashboard Layout & Components

/* =======================================================
   Dashboard Layout Structure
======================================================= */

.dashboard-container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-areas: 
    "sidebar header header"
    "sidebar main main";
  grid-template-columns: 280px 1fr 1fr;
  grid-template-rows: auto 1fr;
  min-height: 100vh;
  gap: 0;
}

.dashboard-sidebar {
  grid-area: sidebar;
  background: var(--secondary-bg);
  border-left: 1px solid var(--border-light);
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  width: 280px;
  height: 100vh;
  overflow-y: auto;
  z-index: 100;
}

.dashboard-header {
  grid-area: header;
  background: var(--card-bg);
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-light);
  position: sticky;
  top: 0;
  z-index: 50;
  margin-right: 280px;
}

.dashboard-main {
  grid-area: main;
  padding: 2rem;
  margin-right: 280px;
  min-height: calc(100vh - 80px);
}

/* =======================================================
   Sidebar Navigation
======================================================= */

.sidebar-header {
  padding: 2rem 1.5rem;
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-light);
  text-align: center;
}

.sidebar-logo {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 0.75rem;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.sidebar-logo i {
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: var(--accent-blue);
}

.sidebar-title {
  font-size: 1.25rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  margin: 0;
}

.sidebar-subtitle {
  font-size: 0.875rem;
  color: var(--text-muted);
  margin: 0;
}

.sidebar-nav {
  padding: 1rem 0;
}

.nav-section {
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.nav-section-title {
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-muted);
  text-transform: uppercase;
  letter-spacing: 0.1em;
  padding: 0 1.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
}

.nav-items {
  list-style: none;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
}

.nav-item {
  margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
}

.nav-link {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: all var(--transition-normal);
  position: relative;
  border-radius: 0;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.nav-link:hover {
  background: rgba(37, 99, 235, 0.1);
  color: var(--accent-blue);
  padding-right: 2rem;
}

.nav-link.active {
  background: var(--gradient-primary);
  color: white;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.nav-link.active::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  right: 0;
  top: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  width: 4px;
  background: var(--accent-cyan);
}

.nav-link i {
  font-size: 1.25rem;
  margin-left: 1rem;
  min-width: 20px;
}

.nav-link .badge {
  margin-right: auto;
  font-size: 0.625rem;
  padding: 0.125rem 0.5rem;
}

/* Submenu */
.nav-submenu {
  max-height: 0;
  overflow: hidden;
  transition: max-height var(--transition-normal);
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
}

.nav-item.has-submenu.open .nav-submenu {
  max-height: 200px;
}

.nav-submenu .nav-link {
  padding-right: 3rem;
  font-size: 0.875rem;
  font-weight: 400;
}

.nav-submenu .nav-link::before {
  content: 'â€¢';
  margin-left: 1rem;
  color: var(--text-muted);
}

/* =======================================================
   Top Header
======================================================= */

.header-content {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 1rem 2rem;
  height: 80px;
}

.header-left {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 1rem;
}

.page-title {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  margin: 0;
}

.breadcrumb {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  font-size: 0.875rem;
  color: var(--text-muted);
}

.breadcrumb-item {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

.breadcrumb-item:not(:last-child)::after {
  content: '/';
  color: var(--text-muted);
}

.breadcrumb-item a {
  color: var(--accent-blue);
  text-decoration: none;
}

.breadcrumb-item a:hover {
  color: var(--accent-cyan);
}

.header-right {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 1rem;
}

/* Search Bar */
.header-search {
  position: relative;
  min-width: 300px;
}

.header-search .search-input {
  background: var(--primary-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-light);
  padding: 0.625rem 1rem;
  padding-right: 3rem;
  font-size: 0.875rem;
  border-radius: 8px;
  width: 100%;
}

.header-search .search-icon {
  position: absolute;
  left: 1rem;
  top: 50%;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  color: var(--text-muted);
}

/* Header Actions */
.header-actions {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

.header-action {
  position: relative;
  padding: 0.5rem;
  border-radius: 8px;
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all var(--transition-normal);
}

.header-action:hover {
  background: var(--primary-bg);
  color: var(--accent-blue);
}

.header-action i {
  font-size: 1.25rem;
}

.notification-badge {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0.25rem;
  left: 0.25rem;
  background: var(--danger-red);
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.625rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  padding: 0.125rem 0.375rem;
  border-radius: 9999px;
  min-width: 1rem;
  height: 1rem;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
}

/* User Profile */
.header-profile {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.75rem;
  padding: 0.5rem;
  border-radius: 8px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all var(--transition-normal);
}

.header-profile:hover {
  background: var(--primary-bg);
}

.profile-avatar {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background: var(--gradient-primary);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: white;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.profile-info {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

.profile-name {
  font-size: 0.875rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  margin: 0;
}

.profile-role {
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  color: var(--text-muted);
  margin: 0;
}

/* =======================================================
   Dashboard Grid System
======================================================= */

.dashboard-grid {
  display: grid;
  gap: 2rem;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
}

.dashboard-row {
  display: grid;
  gap: 2rem;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.dashboard-row.two-col {
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
}

.dashboard-row.three-col {
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr;
}

.dashboard-row.four-col {
  grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
}

.dashboard-widget {
  background: var(--card-bg);
  border-radius: 12px;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-light);
  overflow: hidden;
}

/* =======================================================
   Stat Cards & Metrics
======================================================= */

.stat-card {
  padding: 2rem;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.stat-card::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  width: 4px;
  height: 100%;
  background: var(--gradient-primary);
}

.stat-card.success::before {
  background: var(--gradient-success);
}

.stat-card.warning::before {
  background: var(--gradient-warning);
}

.stat-card.danger::before {
  background: var(--gradient-danger);
}

.stat-header {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.stat-icon {
  width: 60px;
  height: 60px;
  border-radius: 12px;
  background: rgba(37, 99, 235, 0.1);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: var(--accent-blue);
  font-size: 1.5rem;
}

.stat-icon.success {
  background: rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.1);
  color: var(--success-green);
}

.stat-icon.warning {
  background: rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.1);
  color: var(--warning-yellow);
}

.stat-icon.danger {
  background: rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.1);
  color: var(--danger-red);
}

.stat-trend {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.25rem;
  font-size: 0.875rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.stat-trend.up {
  color: var(--success-green);
}

.stat-trend.down {
  color: var(--danger-red);
}

.stat-trend i {
  font-size: 0.75rem;
}

.stat-body {
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.stat-value {
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  margin: 0 0 0.5rem 0;
  line-height: 1;
}

.stat-label {
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  margin: 0;
}

.stat-description {
  font-size: 0.875rem;
  color: var(--text-muted);
  margin: 0;
}

/* Progress Stats */
.stat-progress {
  margin-top: 1rem;
}

.progress-label {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  font-size: 0.875rem;
}

.progress-percentage {
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-primary);
}

/* =======================================================
   Charts & Visualizations
======================================================= */

.chart-container {
  position: relative;
  height: 300px;
  padding: 1.5rem;
}

.chart-header {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.chart-title {
  font-size: 1.125rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  margin: 0;
}

.chart-actions {
  display: flex;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

.chart-filter {
  background: var(--secondary-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-light);
  border-radius: 6px;
  padding: 0.375rem 0.75rem;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all var(--transition-normal);
}

.chart-filter.active,
.chart-filter:hover {
  background: var(--accent-blue);
  color: white;
  border-color: var(--accent-blue);
}

.chart-canvas {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}

/* =======================================================
   Data Tables
======================================================= */

.data-table-container {
  background: var(--card-bg);
  border-radius: 12px;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-light);
  overflow: hidden;
}

.data-table-header {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-light);
  background: rgba(37, 99, 235, 0.02);
}

.table-title {
  font-size: 1.125rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  margin: 0;
}

.table-actions {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 1rem;
}

.table-search {
  position: relative;
  min-width: 250px;
}

.table-filters {
  display: flex;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

.filter-btn {
  padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
  background: var(--secondary-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-light);
  border-radius: 6px;
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  font-size: 0.875rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all var(--transition-normal);
}

.filter-btn.active,
.filter-btn:hover {
  background: var(--accent-blue);
  color: white;
  border-color: var(--accent-blue);
}

.data-table-body {
  overflow-x: auto;
  max-height: 500px;
}

.data-table {
  width: 100%;
  border-collapse: collapse;
}

.data-table th {
  background: rgba(37, 99, 235, 0.05);
  padding: 1rem;
  text-align: right;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-light);
  position: sticky;
  top: 0;
  z-index: 10;
}

.data-table td {
  padding: 1rem;
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-light);
  color: var(--text-secondary);
}

.data-table tr:hover {
  background: rgba(37, 99, 235, 0.05);
}

.data-table tr:last-child td {
  border-bottom: none;
}

/* Table Actions */
.table-row-actions {
  display: flex;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

.action-btn {
  padding: 0.25rem 0.5rem;
  border-radius: 4px;
  border: none;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  transition: all var(--transition-normal);
}

.action-btn.view {
  background: rgba(6, 182, 212, 0.1);
  color: var(--accent-cyan);
}

.action-btn.edit {
  background: rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.1);
  color: var(--warning-yellow);
}

.action-btn.delete {
  background: rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.1);
  color: var(--danger-red);
}

.action-btn:hover {
  transform: translateY(-1px);
}

/* =======================================================
   Security Status Indicators
======================================================= */

.security-status {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  font-size: 0.875rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.security-status.secure {
  color: var(--success-green);
}

.security-status.warning {
  color: var(--warning-yellow);
}

.security-status.critical {
  color: var(--danger-red);
}

.security-level {
  padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
  border-radius: 9999px;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  letter-spacing: 0.05em;
}

.security-level.low {
  background: rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.1);
  color: var(--success-green);
  border: 1px solid rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.3);
}

.security-level.medium {
  background: rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.1);
  color: var(--warning-yellow);
  border: 1px solid rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.3);
}

.security-level.high {
  background: rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.1);
  color: var(--danger-red);
  border: 1px solid rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.3);
}

.security-level.critical {
  background: var(--gradient-danger);
  color: white;
  border: 1px solid var(--critical-red);
  animation: pulse 2s infinite;
}

/* =======================================================
   Real-time Updates
======================================================= */

.realtime-indicator {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  color: var(--text-muted);
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.realtime-dot {
  width: 8px;
  height: 8px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background: var(--success-green);
  animation: pulse 2s infinite;
}

.last-updated {
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  color: var(--text-muted);
  font-style: italic;
}

/* =======================================================
   Alert System
======================================================= */

.dashboard-alerts {
  position: fixed;
  top: 100px;
  left: 2rem;
  z-index: 1000;
  width: 400px;
}

.dashboard-alert {
  background: var(--card-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-light);
  border-radius: 8px;
  padding: 1rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
  animation: slideInRight 0.3s ease-out;
}

@keyframes slideInRight {
  from {
    transform: translateX(100%);
    opacity: 0;
  }
  to {
    transform: translateX(0);
    opacity: 1;
  }
}

.alert-header {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.alert-close {
  background: none;
  border: none;
  color: var(--text-muted);
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 1.25rem;
  padding: 0;
  width: 24px;
  height: 24px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
}

/* =======================================================
   Loading States
======================================================= */

.loading-skeleton {
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, 
    var(--border-dark) 25%, 
    var(--border-light) 50%, 
    var(--border-dark) 75%
  );
  background-size: 200% 100%;
  animation: loading-shimmer 2s infinite;
  border-radius: 4px;
}

@keyframes loading-shimmer {
  0% {
    background-position: -200% 0;
  }
  100% {
    background-position: 200% 0;
  }
}

.skeleton-text {
  height: 1rem;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.skeleton-text.large {
  height: 1.5rem;
}

.skeleton-text.small {
  height: 0.75rem;
}

.skeleton-card {
  height: 200px;
}

.skeleton-chart {
  height: 300px;
}

/* =======================================================
   Mobile Sidebar
======================================================= */

.sidebar-overlay {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
  z-index: 999;
  display: none;
}

.sidebar-toggle {
  display: none;
  background: none;
  border: none;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  padding: 0.5rem;
  border-radius: 4px;
  transition: all var(--transition-normal);
}

.sidebar-toggle:hover {
  background: var(--primary-bg);
}

/* =======================================================
   Responsive Design
======================================================= */

@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .dashboard-container {
    grid-template-areas: 
      "header"
      "main";
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    grid-template-rows: auto 1fr;
  }
  
  .dashboard-sidebar {
    transform: translateX(100%);
    transition: transform var(--transition-normal);
  }
  
  .dashboard-sidebar.open {
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
  
  .dashboard-header,
  .dashboard-main {
    margin-right: 0;
  }
  
  .sidebar-toggle {
    display: block;
  }
  
  .sidebar-overlay.show {
    display: block;
  }
  
  .dashboard-row.two-col,
  .dashboard-row.three-col,
  .dashboard-row.four-col {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .dashboard-main {
    padding: 1rem;
  }
  
  .header-content {
    padding: 1rem;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: 1rem;
  }
  
  .header-search {
    min-width: 200px;
    order: 3;
    flex-basis: 100%;
  }
  
  .header-actions {
    gap: 0.25rem;
  }
  
  .header-profile .profile-info {
    display: none;
  }
  
  .dashboard-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
  
  .chart-container {
    height: 250px;
    padding: 1rem;
  }
  
  .data-table-header {
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 1rem;
    align-items: stretch;
  }
  
  .table-actions {
    justify-content: space-between;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .header-content {
    padding: 0.75rem;
  }
  
  .page-title {
    font-size: 1.25rem;
  }
  
  .stat-card {
    padding: 1.5rem;
  }
  
  .stat-value {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }
  
  .chart-container {
    height: 200px;
    padding: 0.75rem;
  }
  
  .dashboard-alerts {
    left: 1rem;
    right: 1rem;
    width: auto;
  }
}

    async analyzeNetworkRequest(requestData) {
        const { url, method, headers, payload, ip_address } = requestData;

            pattern.test(url) || (payload && pattern.test(payload))

        if (isMalicious) {
            await this.handleMaliciousRequest(requestData);

        // ÙØ­Øµ Ù‚ÙˆØ§Ø¹Ø¯ SQL Injection
        if (this.detectionRules.get('sql_injection').enabled) {
            const sqlPatterns = this.detectionRules.get('sql_injection').patterns;
            const hasSqlInjection = sqlPatterns.some(pattern => 
                pattern.test(url) || (payload && pattern.test(payload))
            );
            
            if (hasSqlInjection) {

        // ÙØ­Øµ XSS

            const hasXSS = xssPatterns.some(pattern =>

        }
    }

    processRealTimeData(collectorName, data) {

        const timestamp = data.timestamp;
        if (!this.dataWarehouse.rawData.has(collectorName)) {
            this.dataWarehouse.rawData.set(collectorName, new Map());
        }
        this.dataWarehouse.rawData.get(collectorName).set(timestamp, data);

        // Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø¨ÙŠØ§Ù†Ø§Øª
        const processedData = this.processData(collectorName, data);
        if (!this.dataWarehouse.processedData.has(collectorName)) {
            this.dataWarehouse.processedData.set(collectorName, new Map());
        }
        this.dataWarehouse.processedData.get(collectorName).set(timestamp, processedData);

        // ØªØ­Ø¯ÙŠØ« Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù‚Ø§ÙŠÙŠØ³ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¬Ù…Ø¹Ø©
        this.updateAggregatedMetrics(collectorName, processedData);

        // ÙƒØ´Ù Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø°ÙˆØ°
        this.detectRealTimeAnomalies(collectorName, processedData);
    }

    // Ø·Ø±Ù‚ Ù…Ø³Ø§Ø¹Ø¯Ø© Ù„Ù„ØªØ´ÙÙŠØ±
    async calculateHash(data, algorithm = 'SHA-256') {
        const encoder = new TextEncoder();
        const dataBuffer = encoder.encode(typeof data === 'string' ? data : JSON.stringify(data));
        const hashBuffer = await crypto.subtle.digest(algorithm, dataBuffer);
        const hashArray = new Uint8Array(hashBuffer);
        return Array.from(hashArray).map(b => b.toString(16).padStart(2, '0')).join('');
    }

    generateSecureRandom(length = 32) {
        return crypto.getRandomValues(new Uint8Array(length));
    }

    async deriveKeyFromPassword(password, salt, iterations = 100000) {
        const encoder = new TextEncoder();
        const passwordBuffer = encoder.encode(password);
        
        const keyMaterial = await crypto.subtle.importKey(
            'raw',
            passwordBuffer,
            { name: 'PBKDF2' },
            false,
            ['deriveKey']
        );

        const key = await crypto.subtle.deriveKey(
            {
                name: 'PBKDF2',
                salt: salt,
                iterations: iterations,
                hash: 'SHA-256'
            },
            keyMaterial,
            { name: 'AES-GCM', length: 256 },
            false,
            ['encrypt', 'decrypt']
        );

        return key;
    }

    async encryptData(data, algorithm = 'AES-256-GCM') {

        if (!encryptionAlg) {
            throw new Error(`Ø®ÙˆØ§Ø±Ø²Ù…ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„ØªØ´ÙÙŠØ± ØºÙŠØ± Ù…Ø¯Ø¹ÙˆÙ…Ø©: ${algorithm}`);
        }

        const key = await this.generateEncryptionKey(algorithm);
        const iv = this.generateSecureRandom(12); // 96 bits for GCM

        const result = await encryptionAlg.encrypt(data, key, iv);
        
        return {
            ...result,
            keyId: await this.storeKey(key),
            timestamp: new Date().toISOString()
        };
    }

    exportSecurityData(format = 'json') {
        const data = {
            timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
            metrics: this.metrics,
            charts: Object.fromEntries(

                filename = `security-dashboard-${Date.now()}.json`;
                mimeType = 'application/json';
                break;
            case 'csv':

                filename = `security-dashboard-${Date.now()}.csv`;
                mimeType = 'text/csv';
                break;
            default:

        a.download = filename;
        a.click();

                try {

                // Ø¬Ù…Ø¹ Ø­Ø±ÙƒØ© Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¨ÙƒØ©

                // Ø¬Ù…Ø¹ Ù…Ø¹Ù„ÙˆÙ…Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø³ØªØ®Ø¯Ù…
                try {
                    const userActivity = await this.collectUserActivity(incident);
                    evidence.items.push({
                        type: 'user_activity',

                    });
                } catch (error) {
                    console.warn('âš ï¸ Failed to collect user activity:', error);
                }
                
                evidence.collectionEnd = Date.now();
                evidence.collectionDuration = evidence.collectionEnd - evidence.collectionStart;
                
                // Ø­ÙØ¸ Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø¯Ù„Ø© ÙÙŠ Ø³Ù„Ø³Ù„Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø­ÙØ¸
                this.evidenceChain.set(incident.id, evidence);
                
                return evidence;
            },
            
            // ØªØ­Ù„ÙŠÙ„ Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø¯Ù„Ø©
            analyzeEvidence: async (evidence) => {

    /**
     * ØªØµÙ†ÙŠÙ Ø§Ù„Ø­Ø§Ø¯Ø«
     */
    async classifyIncident(incident) {
        let severity = 'LOW';
        let category = 'UNKNOWN';
        let priority = 'MEDIUM';
        
        // ØªØ­Ø¯ÙŠØ¯ Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¯Ø© Ø¨Ù†Ø§Ø¡Ù‹ Ø¹Ù„Ù‰ Ù†Ù‚Ø§Ø· Ø§Ù„ØªÙ‡Ø¯ÙŠØ¯
        if (incident.threatScore >= 0.9) {
            severity = 'CRITICAL';
            priority = 'CRITICAL';
        } else if (incident.threatScore >= 0.7) {
            severity = 'HIGH';
            priority = 'HIGH';
        } else if (incident.threatScore >= 0.5) {
            severity = 'MEDIUM';
            priority = 'MEDIUM';
        }
        
        // ØªØ­Ø¯ÙŠØ¯ Ø§Ù„ÙØ¦Ø© Ø¨Ù†Ø§Ø¡Ù‹ Ø¹Ù„Ù‰ Ø£Ù†ÙˆØ§Ø¹ Ø§Ù„ØªÙ‡Ø¯ÙŠØ¯
        if (incident.threatTypes) {
            if (incident.threatTypes.includes('SQL_INJECTION')) {
                category = 'DATA_BREACH_ATTEMPT';
            } else if (incident.threatTypes.includes('XSS_ATTACK')) {
                category = 'WEB_APPLICATION_ATTACK';
            } else if (incident.threatTypes.includes('BRUTE_FORCE')) {
                category = 'AUTHENTICATION_ATTACK';
            } else if (incident.threatTypes.includes('ANOMALY')) {
                category = 'BEHAVIORAL_ANOMALY';
            }
        }
        
        // Ø­Ø³Ø§Ø¨ ØªØ£Ø«ÙŠØ± Ù…Ø­ØªÙ…Ù„
        const impact = this.calculateIncidentImpact(incident);
        
        return {
            severity: severity,
            category: category,
            priority: priority,
            impact: impact,
            classificationTime: Date.now(),
            confidence: incident.confidence || 0.7
        };
    }
    
    /**
     * ØªÙ†ÙÙŠØ° Ø§Ù„Ø¥Ø¬Ø±Ø§Ø¡Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„ØªÙ„Ù‚Ø§Ø¦ÙŠØ©
     */
    async executeAutomaticActions(incidentRecord) {
        const classification = incidentRecord.classification;
        const executedActions = [];
        
        // ØªØ­Ø¯ÙŠØ¯ Ø§Ù„Ø¥Ø¬Ø±Ø§Ø¡Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù†Ø§Ø³Ø¨Ø© Ù„Ù„Ø´Ø¯Ø©
        const applicableActions = Array.from(this.automatedActions.values()).filter(
            action => this.shouldExecuteAction(action, classification)
        );
        
        for (const action of applicableActions) {
            try {
                this.addToTimeline(incidentRecord, 'ACTION_STARTED', `Starting automated action: ${action.name}`);
                
                const result = await action.execute(incidentRecord.originalIncident);
                
                executedActions.push({
                    action: action.name,
                    result: result,
                    timestamp: Date.now(),
                    success: result.success
                });
                
                this.addToTimeline(
                    incidentRecord, 
                    result.success ? 'ACTION_SUCCESS' : 'ACTION_FAILED',
                    `Automated action ${action.name}: ${result.success ? 'SUCCESS' : 'FAILED'}`
                );
                
            } catch (error) {
                executedActions.push({
                    action: action.name,
                    result: null,
                    timestamp: Date.now(),
                    success: false,
                    error: error.message
                });
                
                this.addToTimeline(incidentRecord, 'ACTION_ERROR', `Error in automated action ${action.name}: ${error.message}`);
            }
        }
        
        incidentRecord.responseActions = executedActions;
        return executedActions;
    }
    
    /**
     * ØªØ¹ÙŠÙŠÙ† ÙØ±Ù‚ Ø§Ù„Ø§Ø³ØªØ¬Ø§Ø¨Ø©
     */
    async assignResponseTeams(incidentRecord) {
        const classification = incidentRecord.classification;
        const escalationConfig = this.escalationMatrix.get(classification.severity);
        
        if (escalationConfig) {
            const assignedTeams = [];
            
            for (const teamId of escalationConfig.teams) {
                const team = this.responseTeams.get(teamId);
                if (team) {
                    assignedTeams.push({
                        teamId: teamId,
                        team: team,
                        assignedAt: Date.now(),
                        status: 'ASSIGNED'
                    });
                    
                    this.addToTimeline(incidentRecord, 'TEAM_ASSIGNED', `Assigned team: ${team.name}`);
                }
            }
            
            incidentRecord.assignedTeams = assignedTeams;
        }
    }

// Ù…Ø­Ø±Ùƒ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø¨ØµØ±ÙŠØ©
class VisualizationEngine {
    constructor() {
        this.charts = new Map();
        this.chartTypes = ['line', 'bar', 'pie', 'doughnut', 'radar', 'scatter', 'area', 'heatmap'];
        this.colorSchemes = {
            security: ['#dc3545', '#fd7e14', '#ffc107', '#28a745'],
            performance: ['#007bff', '#6f42c1', '#e83e8c', '#20c997'],
            business: ['#17a2b8', '#6c757d', '#f8f9fa', '#343a40']
        };
    }

    async create(type, data, options = {}) {
        const canvas = document.createElement('canvas');
        const config = this.buildChartConfig(type, data, options);
        
        const chart = new Chart(canvas, config);
        
        const chartId = this.generateChartId();
        this.charts.set(chartId, chart);
        
        return {
            id: chartId,
            canvas: canvas,
            chart: chart
        };
    }

    updateChart(canvas, config) {
        const existingChart = Chart.getChart(canvas);
        if (existingChart) {
            existingChart.destroy();
        }
        
        new Chart(canvas, config);
    }

    buildChartConfig(type, data, options) {
        const baseConfig = {
            type: type,
            data: data,
            options: {
                responsive: true,
                maintainAspectRatio: false,
                plugins: {
                    legend: {
                        display: options.showLegend !== false
                    },
                    tooltip: {
                        enabled: options.showTooltip !== false
                    }
                },
                ...options
            }
        };

        // ØªØ®ØµÙŠØµ Ø­Ø³Ø¨ Ù†ÙˆØ¹ Ø§Ù„Ø±Ø³Ù… Ø§Ù„Ø¨ÙŠØ§Ù†ÙŠ
        switch (type) {
            case 'line':
            case 'area':
                baseConfig.options.scales = {
                    x: { type: 'time' },
                    y: { beginAtZero: true }
                };
                break;
            case 'heatmap':
                baseConfig.type = 'scatter';
                baseConfig.options.scales = {
                    x: { type: 'linear' },
                    y: { type: 'linear' }
                };
                break;
        }

        return baseConfig;
    }

    generateChartId() {
        return 'chart-' + Date.now() + '-' + Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 5);
    }
}

// Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù„Ø¬ Ø§Ù„Ø¨ÙŠØ§Ù†Ø§Øª ÙÙŠ Ø§Ù„ÙˆÙ‚Øª Ø§Ù„ÙØ¹Ù„ÙŠ
class RealTimeDataProcessor {
    constructor() {
        this.streams = new Map();
        this.processors = new Map();
        this.buffers = new Map();
    }

    addStream(name, processor) {
        this.streams.set(name, processor);
        this.buffers.set(name, []);
    }

    process(streamName, data) {
        const buffer = this.buffers.get(streamName);
        const processor = this.streams.get(streamName);
        
        if (buffer && processor) {
            buffer.push(data);
            return processor.process(buffer);
        }
        
        return null;
    }
}

// Ù…Ø³ØªÙˆØ¯Ø¹ Ø§Ù„Ø¨ÙŠØ§Ù†Ø§Øª
class DataWarehouse {
    constructor() {
        this.storage = new Map();
        this.indices = new Map();
        this.maxSize = 1000000; // 1M records
    }

    async store(data, metadata = {}) {
        const record = {
            id: this.generateId(),
            timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
            data: data,
            metadata: metadata
        };

        this.storage.set(record.id, record);
        this.updateIndices(record);
        this.checkSizeLimit();

        return record.id;
    }

    async query(filters = {}) {
        let results = Array.from(this.storage.values());

        // ØªØ·Ø¨ÙŠÙ‚ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø±Ø´Ø­Ø§Øª
        if (filters.startDate) {
            results = results.filter(r => r.timestamp >= filters.startDate);
        }
        if (filters.endDate) {
            results = results.filter(r => r.timestamp <= filters.endDate);
        }
        if (filters.type) {
            results = results.filter(r => r.metadata.type === filters.type);
        }

        return results;
    }

    generateId() {
        return 'data-' + Date.now() + '-' + Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 8);
    }

    updateIndices(record) {
        // ØªØ­Ø¯ÙŠØ« Ø§Ù„ÙÙ‡Ø§Ø±Ø³ Ù„Ù„Ø¨Ø­Ø« Ø§Ù„Ø³Ø±ÙŠØ¹
        const type = record.metadata.type;
        if (type) {
            if (!this.indices.has(type)) {
                this.indices.set(type, new Set());
            }
            this.indices.get(type).add(record.id);
        }
    }

    checkSizeLimit() {
        if (this.storage.size > this.maxSize) {

class PriorityQueue {
    constructor() {
        this.items = [];
    }

    enqueue(item, priority) {
        const queueItem = { item, priority };
        let added = false;

        for (let i = 0; i < this.items.length; i++) {
            if (queueItem.priority > this.items[i].priority) {
                this.items.splice(i, 0, queueItem);
                added = true;
                break;
            }
        }

        if (!added) {
            this.items.push(queueItem);
        }
    }

    dequeue() {
        return this.items.shift()?.item;
    }

    isEmpty() {
        return this.items.length === 0;
    }

    size() {
        return this.items.length;
    }
}

        this.priority = config.priority;
        this.maxSize = config.poolSize || 3;
        this.connections = [];

class ConnectionAnalytics {
    constructor() {
        this.stats = {
            connections: new Map(),
            messages: new Map(),
            errors: new Map(),
            performance: new Map()
        };
    }

    recordConnection(name, event) {
        if (!this.stats.connections.has(name)) {
            this.stats.connections.set(name, { opened: 0, closed: 0, errors: 0 });
        }
        
        const connectionStats = this.stats.connections.get(name);
        if (event === 'opened') connectionStats.opened++;
        if (event === 'closed') connectionStats.closed++;
    }

    recordMessage(name, type, size) {
        const key = `${name}-${type}`;
        if (!this.stats.messages.has(key)) {
            this.stats.messages.set(key, { count: 0, totalSize: 0 });
        }
        
        const messageStats = this.stats.messages.get(key);
        messageStats.count++;
        messageStats.totalSize += size;
    }

    recordError(name, type, error) {
        const key = `${name}-${type}`;
        if (!this.stats.errors.has(key)) {
            this.stats.errors.set(key, 0);
        }
        
        this.stats.errors.set(key, this.stats.errors.get(key) + 1);
    }

    recordSentMessage(connectionName, type, size) {
        this.recordMessage(connectionName, `sent-${type}`, size);
    }

    getStats() {
        return {
            connections: Object.fromEntries(this.stats.connections),
            messages: Object.fromEntries(this.stats.messages),
            errors: Object.fromEntries(this.stats.errors),
            performance: Object.fromEntries(this.stats.performance)
        };
    }
}

import time
max_retries = 3
retry_delay = 5

import time
max_retries = 3
retry_delay = 5

for attempt in range(max_retries):
    # Check if AI Drive is mounted
    mount_output = !mount | grep /mnt/aidrive
    # Expected output format: ['AIDriveFUSE on /mnt/aidrive type fuse (rw,nosuid,nodev,relatime,user_id=0,group_id=0,allow_other)']
    if mount_output and any('/mnt/aidrive' in line and 'AIDriveFUSE' in line for line in mount_output):
        print(f"AI Drive is mounted (attempt {attempt + 1})")
        print(f"Mount info: {mount_output}")
        break
    elif attempt < max_retries - 1:
        print(f"AI Drive not mounted (attempt {attempt + 1}), waiting {retry_delay} seconds for mount to complete...")
        time.sleep(retry_delay)
    else:
        print(f"AI Drive not mounted after {max_retries * retry_delay} seconds")
        if mount_output:
            print(f"Current mount output: {mount_output}")
        raise RuntimeError("AI Drive is not mounted. Please ensure AI Drive is properly configured.")

    def _calculate_hourly_activity(self, events: List[Dict]) -> List[Dict]:
        """Ø­Ø³Ø§Ø¨ Ø§Ù„Ù†Ø´Ø§Ø· Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ø³Ø§Ø¹Ø©"""
        hourly_data = defaultdict(int)
        
        for event in events:
            try:
                timestamp = datetime.fromisoformat(event['timestamp'])
                hour_key = timestamp.strftime('%H:00')
                hourly_data[hour_key] += 1
            except:
                continue
        
        # Ø¥Ù†Ø´Ø§Ø¡ Ø¨ÙŠØ§Ù†Ø§Øª Ù„ÙƒÙ„ Ø³Ø§Ø¹Ø© (24 Ø³Ø§Ø¹Ø©)
        result = []
        for hour in range(24):
            hour_str = f"{hour:02d}:00"
            result.append({
                'hour': hour_str,
                'count': hourly_data.get(hour_str, 0)
            })
        
        return result
    
    def _get_top_attack_countries(self, events: List[Dict]) -> List[Dict]:
        """Ø§Ù„Ø­ØµÙˆÙ„ Ø¹Ù„Ù‰ Ø£Ù‡Ù… Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ù„Ø¯Ø§Ù† Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù‡Ø§Ø¬Ù…Ø©"""
        countries = defaultdict(int)
        
        for event in events:
            location = event.get('location')
            if location and isinstance(location, dict):
                country = location.get('country', 'Unknown')
                countries[country] += 1
        
        # ØªØ±ØªÙŠØ¨ Ø§Ù„Ù†ØªØ§Ø¦Ø¬
        sorted_countries = sorted(
            countries.items(),

        )[:10]
        
        return [
            {'country': country, 'count': count}
            for country, count in sorted_countries
        ]
    
    def _calculate_response_times(self, events: List[Dict]) -> Dict[str, float]:
        """Ø­Ø³Ø§Ø¨ Ø£ÙˆÙ‚Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„Ø§Ø³ØªØ¬Ø§Ø¨Ø©"""
        response_times = []
        
        for event in events:

                # Ø§ÙØªØ±Ø§Ø¶ Ø£Ù† ÙˆÙ‚Øª Ø§Ù„Ø§Ø³ØªØ¬Ø§Ø¨Ø© Ù…Ø­ÙÙˆØ¸ ÙÙŠ Ø§Ù„Ø¨ÙŠØ§Ù†Ø§Øª
                response_time = event.get('response_time', 0)
                if response_time > 0:
                    response_times.append(response_time)
        
        if not response_times:

        return {
            'avg': sum(response_times) / len(response_times),
            'min': min(response_times),
            'max': max(response_times)
        }

    def _encrypt_aes_gcm(self, data: bytes) -> Tuple[bytes, Dict[str, str]]:
        """ØªØ´ÙÙŠØ± AES-256-GCM"""
        key = PBKDF2(self.master_key, b'aes_salt', 32, count=100000)
        cipher = AES.new(key, AES.MODE_GCM)
        
        ciphertext, tag = cipher.encrypt_and_digest(data)
        
        metadata = {
            'nonce': base64.b64encode(cipher.nonce).decode('utf-8'),
            'tag': base64.b64encode(tag).decode('utf-8')
        }
        
        return ciphertext, metadata
    
    def _decrypt_aes_gcm(self, data: bytes, metadata: Dict[str, str]) -> bytes:
        """ÙÙƒ ØªØ´ÙÙŠØ± AES-256-GCM"""
        key = PBKDF2(self.master_key, b'aes_salt', 32, count=100000)
        nonce = base64.b64decode(metadata['nonce'])
        tag = base64.b64decode(metadata['tag'])
        
        cipher = AES.new(key, AES.MODE_GCM, nonce=nonce)
        return cipher.decrypt_and_verify(data, tag)
    
    def _encrypt_chacha20(self, data: bytes) -> Tuple[bytes, Dict[str, str]]:
        """ØªØ´ÙÙŠØ± ChaCha20-Poly1305"""
        key = PBKDF2(self.master_key, b'chacha_salt', 32, count=100000)
        cipher = ChaCha20_Poly1305.new(key=key)
        
        ciphertext, tag = cipher.encrypt_and_digest(data)

    def _decrypt_chacha20(self, data: bytes, metadata: Dict[str, str]) -> bytes:
        """ÙÙƒ ØªØ´ÙÙŠØ± ChaCha20-Poly1305"""
        key = PBKDF2(self.master_key, b'chacha_salt', 32, count=100000)

    def _encrypt_rsa(self, data: bytes) -> Tuple[bytes, Dict[str, str]]:
        """ØªØ´ÙÙŠØ± RSA"""
        # ØªÙ‚Ø³ÙŠÙ… Ø§Ù„Ø¨ÙŠØ§Ù†Ø§Øª Ø¥Ù„Ù‰ Ø£Ø¬Ø²Ø§Ø¡ ØµØºÙŠØ±Ø© Ù„Ù€ RSA
        key = RSA.import_key(self.rsa_keys[1])  # Ø§Ù„Ù…ÙØªØ§Ø­ Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ù…
        max_chunk_size = key.size_in_bytes() - 42  # OAEP padding
        
        encrypted_chunks = []
        for i in range(0, len(data), max_chunk_size):
            chunk = data[i:i + max_chunk_size]
            encrypted_chunk = pss.new(key).sign(SHA256.new(chunk))
            encrypted_chunks.append(encrypted_chunk)
        
        return b''.join(encrypted_chunks), {'chunks': len(encrypted_chunks)}
    
    def _decrypt_rsa(self, data: bytes, metadata: Dict[str, str]) -> bytes:
        """ÙÙƒ ØªØ´ÙÙŠØ± RSA"""
        # Ù‡Ø°Ø§ Ù…Ø«Ø§Ù„ Ù…Ø¨Ø³Ø· - ÙÙŠ Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ§Ù‚Ø¹ Ù†Ø­ØªØ§Ø¬ Ù„Ø­ÙØ¸ Ø§Ù„Ø¨ÙŠØ§Ù†Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø´ÙØ±Ø© Ø¨Ø·Ø±ÙŠÙ‚Ø© Ù…Ø®ØªÙ„ÙØ©
        return data  # Ù…Ø¤Ù‚Øª
    
    def _encrypt_post_quantum(self, data: bytes) -> Tuple[bytes, Dict[str, str]]:
        """ØªØ´ÙÙŠØ± Ù…Ù‚Ø§ÙˆÙ… Ù„Ù„Ø­Ø§Ø³ÙˆØ¨ Ø§Ù„ÙƒÙ…ÙŠ (Ù…Ø­Ø§ÙƒØ§Ø©)"""
        # Ù‡Ø°Ø§ Ù…Ø«Ø§Ù„ - ÙÙŠ Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ§Ù‚Ø¹ Ù†Ø­ØªØ§Ø¬ Ù…ÙƒØªØ¨Ø© Ù…ØªØ®ØµØµØ©
        quantum_key = hashlib.blake2b(self.master_key + b'quantum_salt', digest_size=32).digest()
        
        # Ø§Ø³ØªØ®Ø¯Ø§Ù… ØªØ´ÙÙŠØ± Ù…ØªØ¹Ø¯Ø¯ Ø§Ù„Ø·Ø¨Ù‚Ø§Øª ÙƒØ¨Ø¯ÙŠÙ„
        cipher = AES.new(quantum_key, AES.MODE_GCM)

        metadata = {
            'nonce': base64.b64encode(cipher.nonce).decode('utf-8'),

        return ciphertext, metadata
    
    def _decrypt_post_quantum(self, data: bytes, metadata: Dict[str, str]) -> bytes:
        """ÙÙƒ Ø§Ù„ØªØ´ÙÙŠØ± Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù‚Ø§ÙˆÙ… Ù„Ù„ÙƒÙ…ÙŠ"""
        quantum_key = hashlib.blake2b(self.master_key + b'quantum_salt', digest_size=32).digest()
        nonce = base64.b64decode(metadata['nonce'])
        tag = base64.b64decode(metadata['tag'])
        
        cipher = AES.new(quantum_key, AES.MODE_GCM, nonce=nonce)

    def _calculate_integrity_hash(self, data: bytes) -> str:
        """Ø­Ø³Ø§Ø¨ hash Ø§Ù„ØªÙƒØ§Ù…Ù„"""
        hash_obj = BLAKE2b.new(digest_bits=256)
        hash_obj.update(data)
        return hash_obj.hexdigest()
    
    def _verify_integrity(self, data: bytes, expected_hash: str) -> bool:
        """Ø§Ù„ØªØ­Ù‚Ù‚ Ù…Ù† ØªÙƒØ§Ù…Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø¨ÙŠØ§Ù†Ø§Øª"""
        return self._calculate_integrity_hash(data) == expected_hash

    async def evaluate_trust(self, context: SecurityContext) -> float:
        """ØªÙ‚ÙŠÙŠÙ… Ù…Ø³ØªÙˆÙ‰ Ø§Ù„Ø«Ù‚Ø©"""
        trust_score = 1.0  # Ù†Ø¨Ø¯Ø£ Ø¨Ø¹Ø¯Ù… Ø§Ù„Ø«Ù‚Ø© Ø§Ù„ÙƒØ§Ù…Ù„Ø©
        
        # Ø¹ÙˆØ§Ù…Ù„ ØªÙ‚Ù„ÙŠÙ„ Ø§Ù„Ø«Ù‚Ø©
        risk_factors = await self._analyze_risk_factors(context)
        
        for factor, weight in risk_factors.items():
            trust_score -= weight
        
        # Ø¶Ù…Ø§Ù† Ø£Ù† Ø§Ù„Ù†ØªÙŠØ¬Ø© Ø¨ÙŠÙ† 0 Ùˆ 1
        trust_score = max(0.0, min(1.0, trust_score))
        
        # Ø­ÙØ¸ Ø§Ù„Ù†ØªÙŠØ¬Ø©
        await self._store_trust_evaluation(context, trust_score, risk_factors)
        
        return trust_score

        """ØªØ­Ù„ÙŠÙ„ Ø¹ÙˆØ§Ù…Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø®Ø§Ø·Ø±"""

class UserBehaviorAnalyzer:

    async def analyze_user_patterns(self, user_id: Optional[str] = None) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """ØªØ­Ù„ÙŠÙ„ Ø£Ù†Ù…Ø§Ø· Ø³Ù„ÙˆÙƒ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø³ØªØ®Ø¯Ù…ÙŠÙ†"""
        try:

                return await self._analyze_single_user(user_id)

                return await self._analyze_all_users()
                
        except Exception as e:

            return {'error': str(e)}
    
    async def _analyze_single_user(self, user_id: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """ØªØ­Ù„ÙŠÙ„ Ø³Ù„ÙˆÙƒ Ù…Ø³ØªØ®Ø¯Ù… ÙˆØ§Ø­Ø¯"""
        try:
            # Ø¬Ù„Ø¨ Ø¨ÙŠØ§Ù†Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø³ØªØ®Ø¯Ù…
            access_patterns = await self.redis_client.lrange(f"access_patterns:{user_id}", 0, -1)
            trust_evaluations = await self.redis_client.lrange(f"trust_evaluations:{user_id}", 0, -1)
            
            if not access_patterns and not trust_evaluations:
                return {'error': 'No user data found'}
            
            # ØªØ­Ù„ÙŠÙ„ Ø£Ù†Ù…Ø§Ø· Ø§Ù„ÙˆØµÙˆÙ„
            access_data = []
            for pattern_raw in access_patterns:
                try:
                    pattern = json.loads(pattern_raw)
                    access_data.append(pattern)
                except:
                    continue
            
            # ØªØ­Ù„ÙŠÙ„ ØªÙ‚ÙŠÙŠÙ…Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„Ø«Ù‚Ø©
            trust_data = []
            for trust_raw in trust_evaluations:
                try:
                    trust = json.loads(trust_raw)
                    trust_data.append(trust)
                except:
                    continue
            
            analysis = {
                'user_id': user_id,
                'total_sessions': len(access_data),
                'avg_trust_score': np.mean([t.get('trust_score', 0) for t in trust_data]) if trust_data else 0,
                'access_patterns': self._analyze_access_patterns(access_data),
                'trust_trends': self._analyze_trust_trends(trust_data),
                'risk_factors': self._identify_risk_factors(access_data, trust_data),
                'recommendations': self._generate_user_recommendations(access_data, trust_data)
            }
            
            return analysis
            
        except Exception as e:
            return {'error': str(e)}
    
    async def _analyze_all_users(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """ØªØ­Ù„ÙŠÙ„ Ø´Ø§Ù…Ù„ Ù„Ø¬Ù…ÙŠØ¹ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø³ØªØ®Ø¯Ù…ÙŠÙ†"""
        try:
            # Ø¬Ù„Ø¨ Ù‚Ø§Ø¦Ù…Ø© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø³ØªØ®Ø¯Ù…ÙŠÙ†
            user_keys = await self.redis_client.keys("access_patterns:*")
            
            users_data = []
            for user_key in user_keys:
                user_id = user_key.decode().split(":")[1]
                user_analysis = await self._analyze_single_user(user_id)
                if 'error' not in user_analysis:
                    users_data.append(user_analysis)
            
            if not users_data:
                return {'error': 'No users data found'}
            
            # ØªØ­Ù„ÙŠÙ„ Ø¥Ø¬Ù…Ø§Ù„ÙŠ
            analysis = {
                'total_users': len(users_data),
                'avg_trust_score': np.mean([u.get('avg_trust_score', 0) for u in users_data]),
                'user_clusters': await self._cluster_users(users_data),
                'global_patterns': self._analyze_global_patterns(users_data),
                'security_insights': self._generate_security_insights(users_data)
            }
            
            return analysis
            
        except Exception as e:
            return {'error': str(e)}
    
    def _analyze_access_patterns(self, access_data: List[Dict]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """ØªØ­Ù„ÙŠÙ„ Ø£Ù†Ù…Ø§Ø· Ø§Ù„ÙˆØµÙˆÙ„"""
        if not access_data:
            return {}
        
        df = pd.DataFrame(access_data)
        
        patterns = {
            'peak_hours': df['timestamp'].apply(lambda x: pd.to_datetime(x).hour).mode().tolist(),
            'session_duration_avg': df['duration'].mean() if 'duration' in df.columns else 0,
            'most_accessed_resources': df['resource'].value_counts().head().to_dict() if 'resource' in df.columns else {},
            'device_diversity': df['device_info'].nunique() if 'device_info' in df.columns else 0
        }
        
        return patterns
    
    def _analyze_trust_trends(self, trust_data: List[Dict]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """ØªØ­Ù„ÙŠÙ„ Ø§ØªØ¬Ø§Ù‡Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„Ø«Ù‚Ø©"""
        if not trust_data:
            return {}
        
        df = pd.DataFrame(trust_data)
        df['timestamp'] = pd.to_datetime(df['timestamp'])
        
        trends = {
            'trust_trend': 'improving' if df['trust_score'].iloc[-1] > df['trust_score'].iloc[0] else 'declining',
            'volatility': df['trust_score'].std(),
            'lowest_trust': df['trust_score'].min(),
            'highest_trust': df['trust_score'].max(),
            'recent_trend': df.tail(10)['trust_score'].mean() - df.head(10)['trust_score'].mean()
        }
        
        return trends

        """Ø§Ø³ØªØ®Ø±Ø§Ø¬ Ø§Ù„Ø±Ø¤Ù‰ Ø§Ù„Ø£Ù…Ù†ÙŠØ©"""

        if 'total_events' in security_data:

    def __init__(self, geoip_db_path: str = None):

    async def check_ip_reputation(self, ip_address: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """ÙØ­Øµ Ø³Ù…Ø¹Ø© Ø¹Ù†ÙˆØ§Ù† IP"""
        result = {

            'city': None,
            'organization': None,
            'threat_types': []
        }
        
        try:
            # Check against known threats
            if ip_address in self.known_threats:
                result['is_malicious'] = True
                result['risk_score'] = 0.9
                result['threat_types'].append('known_malicious')
            
            # GeoIP lookup
            if self.geoip_reader:
                try:
                    response = self.geoip_reader.city(ip_address)
                    result['country'] = response.country.name
                    result['city'] = response.city.name
                    result['organization'] = response.traits.organization
                except Exception:

            # Check for private/internal IPs
            ip_obj = ipaddress.ip_address(ip_address)
            if ip_obj.is_private:
                result['risk_score'] = max(result['risk_score'], 0.1)
                result['threat_types'].append('internal_network')
            
            # Cache result
            cache_key = f"ip_reputation:{ip_address}"
            self.redis_client.setex(

                3600,  # 1 hour cache
                json.dumps(result)
            )
            
        except Exception as e:

class BehavioralAnalyzer:

        """ÙƒØ´Ù Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø°ÙˆØ° ÙÙŠ Ø§Ù„Ø³Ù„ÙˆÙƒ"""

    def _analyze_time_anomaly(self, profile: BehavioralPattern, session_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> float:
        """ØªØ­Ù„ÙŠÙ„ Ø´Ø°ÙˆØ° Ø§Ù„ØªÙˆÙ‚ÙŠØª"""
        if not profile.login_times:
            return 0.5
        
        current_hour = datetime.now().hour
        hour_freq = {}
        for hour in profile.login_times:
            hour_freq[hour] = hour_freq.get(hour, 0) + 1
        
        total_logins = len(profile.login_times)
        current_freq = hour_freq.get(current_hour, 0) / total_logins
        
        if current_freq < 0.05:  # Less than 5% of logins at this hour
            return 0.8
        elif current_freq < 0.15:  # Less than 15% of logins
            return 0.6
        else:
            return 0.2
    
    def _analyze_location_anomaly(self, profile: BehavioralPattern, session_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> float:
        """ØªØ­Ù„ÙŠÙ„ Ø´Ø°ÙˆØ° Ø§Ù„Ù…ÙˆÙ‚Ø¹"""
        current_ip = session_data.get('ip_address')

        else:
            return 0.7
    
    def _analyze_device_anomaly(self, profile: BehavioralPattern, session_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> float:
        """ØªØ­Ù„ÙŠÙ„ Ø´Ø°ÙˆØ° Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ù‡Ø§Ø²"""
        current_device = session_data.get('device_fingerprint')

        else:

    def _analyze_access_anomaly(self, profile: BehavioralPattern, session_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> float:
        """ØªØ­Ù„ÙŠÙ„ Ø´Ø°ÙˆØ° Ø§Ù„ÙˆØµÙˆÙ„ Ù„Ù„Ù…ÙˆØ§Ø±Ø¯"""
        current_resources = set(session_data.get('accessed_resources', []))
        if not current_resources:
            return 0.3
        
        known_resources = set(profile.access_patterns.keys())
        unknown_resources = current_resources - known_resources
        
        if len(unknown_resources) == 0:
            return 0.2
        elif len(unknown_resources) / len(current_resources) > 0.5:
            return 0.8
        else:
            return 0.5

    async def analyze_event(self, event_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> ThreatEvent:
        """ØªØ­Ù„ÙŠÙ„ Ø­Ø¯Ø« Ø£Ù…Ù†ÙŠ Ø´Ø§Ù…Ù„"""
        start_time = time.time()
        
        try:
            # Generate event ID
            event_id = hashlib.sha256(
                f"{event_data.get('user_id', '')}{event_data.get('timestamp', time.time())}"
                f"{event_data.get('ip_address', '')}".encode()
            ).hexdigest()[:16]
            
            # Initialize threat event

                threat_level=ThreatLevel.LOW,
                threat_category=ThreatCategory.ANOMALOUS_BEHAVIOR,
                confidence_score=0.0,
                description="Initial analysis",
                metadata=event_data.copy()
            )
            
            # Multi-layered analysis
            analyses = await asyncio.gather(
                self._analyze_ip_reputation(event_data),
                self._analyze_behavioral_patterns(event_data),
                self._analyze_with_rules(event_data),
                self._analyze_with_ml(event_data),
                return_exceptions=True
            )
            
            ip_analysis, behavioral_analysis, rule_analysis, ml_analysis = analyses
            
            # Combine results
            risk_scores = []
            threat_indicators = []
            
            if isinstance(ip_analysis, dict):
                risk_scores.append(ip_analysis.get('risk_score', 0))
                if ip_analysis.get('is_malicious'):

                    threat_event.threat_category = ThreatCategory.SUSPICIOUS_IP

                threat_indicators.extend(rule_analysis.get('triggered_rules', []))
            
            if isinstance(ml_analysis, dict):
                risk_scores.append(ml_analysis.get('risk_score', 0))
                if ml_analysis.get('is_threat'):
                    threat_indicators.append('ml_detection')
            
            # Calculate overall risk
            if risk_scores:
                avg_risk = sum(risk_scores) / len(risk_scores)
                max_risk = max(risk_scores)
                final_risk = (avg_risk * 0.6) + (max_risk * 0.4)
            else:
                final_risk = 0.5
            
            # Determine threat level
            if final_risk >= 0.8:
                threat_event.threat_level = ThreatLevel.CRITICAL
            elif final_risk >= 0.6:
                threat_event.threat_level = ThreatLevel.HIGH
            elif final_risk >= 0.4:
                threat_event.threat_level = ThreatLevel.MEDIUM
            else:
                threat_event.threat_level = ThreatLevel.LOW
            
            threat_event.confidence_score = final_risk
            threat_event.description = f"Threat analysis completed. Indicators: {', '.join(threat_indicators)}"
            threat_event.metadata.update({
                'analyses': {
                    'ip_reputation': ip_analysis if isinstance(ip_analysis, dict) else None,
                    'behavioral': behavioral_analysis if isinstance(behavioral_analysis, dict) else None,
                    'rule_based': rule_analysis if isinstance(rule_analysis, dict) else None,
                    'ml_based': ml_analysis if isinstance(ml_analysis, dict) else None
                },
                'threat_indicators': threat_indicators,
                'processing_time': time.time() - start_time
            })
            
            # Store threat event
            await self._store_threat_event(threat_event)
            
            # Update statistics
            self.detection_stats['total_events'] += 1
            self.detection_stats['response_times'].append(time.time() - start_time)
            
            if threat_event.threat_level in [ThreatLevel.HIGH, ThreatLevel.CRITICAL]:
                self.detection_stats['threats_detected'] += 1
            
            return threat_event
            
        except Exception as e:

    async def _analyze_ip_reputation(self, event_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:

    async def _analyze_with_rules(self, event_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """ØªØ­Ù„ÙŠÙ„ Ø¨Ø§Ø³ØªØ®Ø¯Ø§Ù… Ø§Ù„Ù‚ÙˆØ§Ø¹Ø¯ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø­Ø¯Ø¯Ø© Ù…Ø³Ø¨Ù‚Ø§Ù‹"""
        triggered_rules = []
        max_severity = ThreatLevel.LOW
        
        for rule in self.threat_rules:
            try:
                if rule['condition'](event_data):
                    triggered_rules.append(rule['name'])
                    if rule['severity'].value > max_severity.value:
                        max_severity = rule['severity']
            except Exception as e:
                self.logger.warning(f"Error evaluating rule {rule['name']}: {e}")
        
        risk_score = len(triggered_rules) * 0.3
        if max_severity == ThreatLevel.CRITICAL:
            risk_score = min(risk_score + 0.6, 1.0)
        elif max_severity == ThreatLevel.HIGH:
            risk_score = min(risk_score + 0.4, 1.0)
        
        return {
            'risk_score': min(risk_score, 1.0),
            'triggered_rules': triggered_rules,
            'max_severity': max_severity.value
        }
    
    async def _analyze_with_ml(self, event_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """ØªØ­Ù„ÙŠÙ„ Ø¨Ø§Ø³ØªØ®Ø¯Ø§Ù… Ø§Ù„ØªØ¹Ù„Ù… Ø§Ù„Ø¢Ù„ÙŠ"""

            # Use anomaly detector
            anomaly_detector = self.ml_models.get('anomaly_detector')
            if anomaly_detector and hasattr(anomaly_detector, 'predict'):
                anomaly_score = anomaly_detector.decision_function([features])[0]
                is_anomaly = anomaly_detector.predict([features])[0] == -1
                
                # Normalize score to 0-1 range
                normalized_score = max(0, min(1, (anomaly_score + 0.5)))
                
                return {
                    'risk_score': normalized_score,
                    'is_threat': is_anomaly,
                    'ml_score': anomaly_score
                }
            
            return {'risk_score': 0.5, 'is_threat': False}
            
        except Exception as e:
            self.logger.error(f"Error in ML analysis: {e}")
            return {'risk_score': 0.5, 'is_threat': False}
    
    def _extract_features(self, event_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> List[float]:
        """Ø§Ø³ØªØ®Ø±Ø§Ø¬ Ø§Ù„Ù…ÙŠØ²Ø§Øª Ù„Ù„ØªØ¹Ù„Ù… Ø§Ù„Ø¢Ù„ÙŠ"""
        features = []
        
        try:
            # Time-based features
            current_time = datetime.now()
            features.append(current_time.hour / 24.0)  # Hour of day
            features.append(current_time.weekday() / 7.0)  # Day of week
            
            # Session features
            features.append(event_data.get('session_duration', 0) / 3600.0)  # Hours
            features.append(len(event_data.get('accessed_resources', [])) / 100.0)  # Resource count
            features.append(event_data.get('failed_attempts', 0) / 10.0)  # Failed attempts
            
            # Device features
            features.append(1.0 if event_data.get('new_device') else 0.0)
            features.append(1.0 if event_data.get('new_location') else 0.0)
            
            # Pad or truncate to fixed size
            target_size = 10
            if len(features) < target_size:
                features.extend([0.0] * (target_size - len(features)))
            else:
                features = features[:target_size]
            
            return features
            
        except Exception as e:
            self.logger.error(f"Error extracting features: {e}")
            return [0.5] * 10  # Default feature vector

    def _setup_websocket_handlers(self):
        """Ø¥Ø¹Ø¯Ø§Ø¯ Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ø§Øª WebSocket"""
        
        @self.socketio.on('connect')
        def handle_connect():
            """Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù„Ø¬ Ø§Ù„Ø§ØªØµØ§Ù„"""
            try:
                # Add user to connected users
                session_id = request.sid
                self.connected_users.add(session_id)
                
                self.logger.info(f"User connected: {session_id}")
                
                # Send initial data
                emit('connection_established', {
                    'status': 'connected',
                    'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat(),
                    'session_id': session_id
                })
                
                # Send current dashboard state
                overview_data = asyncio.run(self._get_dashboard_overview())
                emit('dashboard_update', overview_data)
                
            except Exception as e:
                self.logger.error(f"WebSocket connect error: {e}")
        
        @self.socketio.on('disconnect')
        def handle_disconnect():
            """Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù„Ø¬ Ù‚Ø·Ø¹ Ø§Ù„Ø§ØªØµØ§Ù„"""
            try:
                session_id = request.sid
                self.connected_users.discard(session_id)
                
                self.logger.info(f"User disconnected: {session_id}")
                
            except Exception as e:
                self.logger.error(f"WebSocket disconnect error: {e}")
        
        @self.socketio.on('join_room')
        def handle_join_room(data):
            """Ø§Ù„Ø§Ù†Ø¶Ù…Ø§Ù… Ø¥Ù„Ù‰ ØºØ±ÙØ© Ù…Ø±Ø§Ù‚Ø¨Ø© Ù…Ø­Ø¯Ø¯Ø©"""
            try:
                room = data.get('room')
                if room in ['threats', 'incidents', 'system_status']:
                    join_room(room)
                    emit('room_joined', {'room': room, 'status': 'success'})
                else:
                    emit('room_joined', {'room': room, 'status': 'invalid_room'})
                    
            except Exception as e:
                self.logger.error(f"Join room error: {e}")
        
        @self.socketio.on('leave_room')
        def handle_leave_room(data):
            """Ù…ØºØ§Ø¯Ø±Ø© ØºØ±ÙØ© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø±Ø§Ù‚Ø¨Ø©"""

        def monitoring_loop():

                try:
                    # Update real-time statistics

                    # Broadcast updates to connected users
                    if self.connected_users:
                        overview_data = asyncio.run(self._get_dashboard_overview())

    def _log_security_event(self, event_data: Dict[str, Any]):
        """ØªØ³Ø¬ÙŠÙ„ Ø­Ø¯Ø« Ø£Ù…Ù†ÙŠ"""
        try:
            event_key = f"security_event:{int(time.time() * 1000)}"
            self.redis_client.setex(
                event_key,
                86400,  # 24 hours
                json.dumps(event_data)
            )
            
            # Also add to recent activities
            activities_key = "recent_activities"
            self.redis_client.lpush(activities_key, json.dumps(event_data))
            self.redis_client.ltrim(activities_key, 0, 99)  # Keep last 100
            
        except Exception as e:
            self.logger.error(f"Error logging security event: {e}")

    async def _evaluate_historical_trust(self, context: SecurityContext) -> float:
        """ØªÙ‚ÙŠÙŠÙ… Ø§Ù„Ø«Ù‚Ø© Ø§Ù„ØªØ§Ø±ÙŠØ®ÙŠØ©"""
        try:
            # Get user's historical security events

                return 0.7  # New user - neutral trust
            
            history = json.loads(history_data)
            
            # Calculate trust based on historical events
            security_incidents = history.get('security_incidents', 0)
            successful_logins = history.get('successful_logins', 0)
            failed_logins = history.get('failed_logins', 0)
            
            # Base score
            score = 0.7
            
            # Penalize security incidents
            if security_incidents > 0:
                penalty = min(security_incidents * 0.1, 0.5)
                score -= penalty
            
            # Reward good login ratio
            if successful_logins > 0 and failed_logins > 0:
                success_ratio = successful_logins / (successful_logins + failed_logins)
                if success_ratio > 0.95:
                    score += 0.2
                elif success_ratio > 0.90:
                    score += 0.1
                elif success_ratio < 0.8:
                    score -= 0.2
            
            # Account age bonus
            account_created = history.get('account_created')
            if account_created:
                account_age = datetime.now() - datetime.fromisoformat(account_created)
                if account_age > timedelta(days=365):
                    score += 0.1
                elif account_age > timedelta(days=90):
                    score += 0.05
            
            return max(min(score, 1.0), 0.0)
            
        except Exception as e:
            self.logger.error(f"Error evaluating historical trust: {e}")
            return 0.5

    def _load_default_templates(self):
